name: vscode-grails
description: Grails Framework Support for Visual Studio Code

scripts.setup: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && gradlew.bat build -x test
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.clean: cd client && (if exist out rmdir /s /q out) && (if exist node_modules\.cache rmdir /s /q node_modules\.cache) && cd ../server && gradlew.bat clean
scripts.test: cd server && gradlew.bat test && cd ../client && npm test
